author: paulhauner
content: Hello everyone, I haven't been present in this channel before but I'm from Lighthouse (Sigma Prime) and I've been working with Flashbots on their post-merge works. I'm keen to move the conversation out of a small group and into a public channel.

author: paulhauner
content:
One of the things I've been working on is understanding the Flashbots system and seeing how it can be best integrated by existing consensus clients. To that end, I've produced this document to try and outline the current design, open questions and desirable properties:

https://hackmd.io/QoLwVQf3QK6EiVt15YOYqQ?view

author: timbeiko
content: Thanks! Cross-posting this btw: community call where we plan to discuss the FB <> CL integration: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/423
